title: Man charged with fatally shooting his brother in Prince George's County
body: LANHAM, MD (WBFF) - A Prince George's County man is charged with fatally shooting his brother after an argument inside an apartment Friday morning.Dominick Pailin, 29, who lives in Lanham, is charged with first-degree murder and second-degree murder in the kiling of his brother, Bryan Pailin, 39, of Morningside.Prince George's County police said Dominick Pailin admitted to shooting his brother "during an on-going dispute."Police were called at about 8:10 a.m. May 7 to Greenbelt Road, where the victim was found shot inside an a apartment, according to a press release.The victim was taken to a hospital and pronounced dead there.Anyone with information in this case is asked to call detectives at 301-516-2512. Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto your mobile device.) Please refer to case number 21-0020177.
